ygData.subject: RE: Interesting.
ygData.msgSnippet: Ranth, Quite honestly its was your usage of the word Greed when refering to others and Honest when refering to yourself that sparked my rant The
ygData.messageBody:
Ranth,

Quite honestly its was your usage of the word "Greed" when refering to
others and "Honest" when refering to yourself that sparked my rant

The implication there is clearly that you are the good guy here and all
others selling for more profit are the bad guys. Had you worded it
differentlty, I might never have responded. I would venture to guess that
Greed also plays an important part in YOUR costs as well (interesting how
you leave yourself out of your statement when you say "Admit it or not,
greed has and will play a BIG part of your sales i presume"), what is it
that plays a BIG part in your sales?

Get off your moral high horse Ranth


Vapn Maistre, Povar

-----Original Message-----
From: Rathan Silvermyst [mailto:eqlegion@...]
Sent: Monday, November 15, 1999 7:16 AM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Interesting.


From: "Rathan Silvermyst" <eqlegion@...>

where to start...where to start...ok. First off...whoever stated to "not
care what others sell them for," well, that is a GREAT idea, so why dont we
all just follow it? This whole argument started because some smart-ass
attacked my post of how i sold Lungs. Therefore i felt i had to defend
myself. Admit it or not, greed has and will play a BIG part of your sales i
presume...if you are such good buisnessmen/women that you all say you are
then you will not have any trouble selling these. Good for you. i really
dont care. This board is meant for tinkering, so lets keep it at that. No,
i am not ashamed for posting my last post, as everything i stated is true.
As for the buisness side of things, you may be making more money than i am,
but i still have a net profit, and my skill has gone up a lot, and MOST
importantly, i have a VERY loyal customer base. So before you jump on the
bandwagon to attack a perfect stranger, why dont you take a look at
yourselves first. last night i sold 8 lungs, think you an do better? net
profit: 1400plat ( after replenishing my stock).
this is my style of buisness, it is working rather splendidly for me, so why
do you care?
-Ranth
